entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind west 20 km/h. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Snow level 2300 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 2200 metres near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016
